turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me place a pizza order from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: of course, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the first, can I have a sausage?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: for the second,

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like pepperoni and for the third I'd like like a veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: small for all three pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. any crust preferences?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, could I please have thin crust on all three as well?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the sausage pizza only comes with thick crust. is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i have three small pizzas, one sausage, one pepperoni and one veggie lovers. is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. your pizzas have been ordered and should be ready for pickup in 1 hour.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much for your help, I appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. I will.
